description: Defines a minimal Jira API client class with constructor and issue search method; acts as a stub for real implementation.

classes.name: JiraClient
classes.description: A stub class for interacting with Jira's API, meant to be extended with real endpoints.

methods.name: __init__(self, base_url: str | None = None, access_token: str | None = None)
methods.description: Initializes JiraClient with optional base URL and access token.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] search_issues(self, jql: str)
methods.description: Asynchronously searches for issues in Jira using JQL query; returns a stubbed response.

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, base_url: str | None = None, access_token: str | None = None):$/
ctags.signature: (self, base_url: str | None = None, access_token: str | None = None)

ctags.name: search_issues
ctags.pattern: /^    async def search_issues(self, jql: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
